value.title: Introduction to GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to use key GitHub features, including issues, notifications, branches, commits, and pull requests.

value.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

value.title: Publish a web app to Azure with Visual Studio
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure App Service to create a new ASP.NET-based web app, then publish and update directly from Visual Studio.

value.title: What is Rust
value.excerpt: A quick introduction to Rust language features and how Rust compares with other programming languages.

value.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform
value.excerpt: Explore the broad array of Azure technologies that analyze text or images and relational, nonrelational, or streaming data.

value.title: Enabling secure remote work using Windows Virtual Desktop | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Windows Virtual Desktop (WVD) is a comprehensive desktop and app virtualization service running in Azure to enable secure remote work. Christiaan Brinkhoff joins Scott Hanselman to show how WVD is different from other desktop virtualization technologies, as well as how easy it is to implement and maintain.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dL1LpGpGRIo" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to connect and deliver services privately on Azure with Azure Private Link | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Narayan Anamalai joins Donovan Brown to introduce Azure Private Link. In this episode, Narayan demonstrates how you can secure Azure PaaS resources and your Azure network using Private Link, and provide protection against data exfiltration.  8:45 - Demo  Azure Private Link overview https://aka.ms/azfr/610/01

value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use Azure Artifacts, an Azure DevOps service, to set up a feed for sharing packages with your team. value.title: How to export your resources to CSV using the Azure Portal | Azure Portal Series

value.title: How to set up an Azure pipeline with Node JS | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to create an Azure Pipeline for a Node.js application. value.title: Align requirements with cloud types and service models in Azure
value.excerpt: Discover Azure's three approaches to deploying cloud resources -- public, private, and hybrid -- and learn the difference each makes in your Azure services.

value.title: Allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset
value.excerpt: Learn how to allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset.

value.title: Microsoft Azure IoT strategy and solutions
value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure IoT, and describes Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure. This knowledge can help bring IoT to life for your organization and customers.

value.title: Capture Web Application Logs with App Service Diagnostics Logging
value.excerpt: Learn about how to capture trace output from your Azure web apps. View a live log stream and download logs files for offline analysis.

value.title: Choose a messaging model in Azure to loosely connect your services
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure's storage queues, event hubs, event grid, and service bus can improve your communication between devices.

value.title: Configure Azure files and Azure File Sync
value.excerpt: You will learn how to configure Azure file and file sync.

value.title: Manage and control traffic flow in your Azure deployment with routes
value.excerpt: Learn how to control Azure virtual network traffic by implementing custom routes.

value.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Set up a continuous integration (CI) pipeline that automates the process of building your application.

value.title: Create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Learn how to create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC).

value.title: Execute an Azure Function with triggers
value.excerpt: This module demos some of the most common types of triggers for executing Azure Functions and how to configure them to execute your logic.
